availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred Oliver (Henderson County, Kentucky, carpenter and farmer.)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, carpenter and farmer. New Jersey native. Married to Mary Ann Hancock Oliver in Henderson County, Kentucky, on December 23, 1846. Father of Mary J. Oliver, Frances Oliver, Sarah L. Oliver, Sue B. Oliver, and Harriet J. Oliver. Carpenter in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Henderson County in 1850. Farmer in Henderson County in 1860. Employed one enslaved person in Henderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 1, p. 275A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 1.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, pp. 113-114.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 149B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994038, Henderson County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film 001944390.
